column1: # These are the 100 K2 stars with the highest RR Lyrae score according to
#  0    = Light curve if overfitted or de-trending introduces spurious signals
#  1    = Star is properly de-trended, preserving amplitude of variability
#  2    = Bad fit, but first order PLD does OK (EVER2 only)
#  3    = Light curve does not exist (K2SC only)
